statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 3 \\ -1 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ -2 \\ 0 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 6 \\ 16 \\ -4 \\ 8 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -9 \\ -45 \\ 13 \\ -19 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 12 \\ 89 \\ -27 \\ 35 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 6 \\ 34 \\ -10 \\ 14 \end{array}\right]\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
